00002 __all__ = ['Serializer', 'SerializerError']

00004 from error import YAMLError
00005 from events import *
00006 from nodes import *
00007 
00008 class SerializerError(YAMLError):
00009     pass
00010 
00011 class Serializer(object):
00012 
00013     ANCHOR_TEMPLATE = u'id%03d'
00014 
00015     def __init__(self, encoding=None,
00016             explicit_start=None, explicit_end=None, version=None, tags=None):
00017         self.use_encoding = encoding
00018         self.use_explicit_start = explicit_start
00019         self.use_explicit_end = explicit_end
00020         self.use_version = version
00021         self.use_tags = tags
00022         self.serialized_nodes = {}
00023         self.anchors = {}
00024         self.last_anchor_id = 0
00025         self.closed = None
00026 
00027     def open(self):
00028         if self.closed is None:
00029             self.emit(StreamStartEvent(encoding=self.use_encoding))
00030             self.closed = False
00031         elif self.closed:
00032             raise SerializerError("serializer is closed")
00033         else:
00034             raise SerializerError("serializer is already opened")
00035 
00036     def close(self):
00037         if self.closed is None:
00038             raise SerializerError("serializer is not opened")
00039         elif not self.closed:
00040             self.emit(StreamEndEvent())
00041             self.closed = True
00042 
00043     #def __del__(self):
00044     #    self.close()
00045 
00046     def serialize(self, node):
00047         if self.closed is None:
00048             raise SerializerError("serializer is not opened")
00049         elif self.closed:
00050             raise SerializerError("serializer is closed")
00051         self.emit(DocumentStartEvent(explicit=self.use_explicit_start,
00052             version=self.use_version, tags=self.use_tags))
00053         self.anchor_node(node)
00054         self.serialize_node(node, None, None)
00055         self.emit(DocumentEndEvent(explicit=self.use_explicit_end))
00056         self.serialized_nodes = {}
00057         self.anchors = {}
00058         self.last_alias_id = 0
00059 
00060     def anchor_node(self, node):
00061         if node in self.anchors:
00062             if self.anchors[node] is None:
00063                 self.anchors[node] = self.generate_anchor(node)
00064         else:
00065             self.anchors[node] = None
00066             if isinstance(node, SequenceNode):
00067                 for item in node.value:
00068                     self.anchor_node(item)
00069             elif isinstance(node, MappingNode):
00070                 for key, value in node.value:
00071                     self.anchor_node(key)
00072                     self.anchor_node(value)
00073 
00074     def generate_anchor(self, node):
00075         self.last_anchor_id += 1
00076         return self.ANCHOR_TEMPLATE % self.last_anchor_id
00077 
00078     def serialize_node(self, node, parent, index):
00079         alias = self.anchors[node]
00080         if node in self.serialized_nodes:
00081             self.emit(AliasEvent(alias))
00082         else:
00083             self.serialized_nodes[node] = True
00084             self.descend_resolver(parent, index)
00085             if isinstance(node, ScalarNode):
00086                 detected_tag = self.resolve(ScalarNode, node.value, (True, False))
00087                 default_tag = self.resolve(ScalarNode, node.value, (False, True))
00088                 implicit = (node.tag == detected_tag), (node.tag == default_tag)
00089                 self.emit(ScalarEvent(alias, node.tag, implicit, node.value,
00090                     style=node.style))
00091             elif isinstance(node, SequenceNode):
00092                 implicit = (node.tag
00093                             == self.resolve(SequenceNode, node.value, True))
00094                 self.emit(SequenceStartEvent(alias, node.tag, implicit,
00095                     flow_style=node.flow_style))
00096                 index = 0
00097                 for item in node.value:
00098                     self.serialize_node(item, node, index)
00099                     index += 1
00100                 self.emit(SequenceEndEvent())
00101             elif isinstance(node, MappingNode):
00102                 implicit = (node.tag
00103                             == self.resolve(MappingNode, node.value, True))
00104                 self.emit(MappingStartEvent(alias, node.tag, implicit,
00105                     flow_style=node.flow_style))
00106                 for key, value in node.value:
00107                     self.serialize_node(key, node, None)
00108                     self.serialize_node(value, node, key)
00109                 self.emit(MappingEndEvent())
00110             self.ascend_resolver()
00111
